import React from 'react'; import './descriptions.css'; import {FaArrowDown, FaArrowUp, FaWind} from 'react-icons/fa'; import {BiHappy} from 'react-icons/bi'; import {MdCompress, MdOutlineWaterDrop} from 'react-icons/md'; import { getWeatherData } from '../weatherData'; const Descriptions = ({weather, units}) => { const tempUnit = units === 'metric' ? 'C' : 'F'; const windUnit = units === 'metric' ? 'm/s' : 'm/h'; const cards = [ { id:1, icon: , title: 'min', data: weather.temp_min.toFixed(), unit: tempUnit }, { id:2, icon: , title: 'max', data: weather.temp_max.toFixed(), unit: tempUnit }, { id:3, icon: , title: 'feels like', data: weather.feels_like.toFixed(), unit: tempUnit }, { id:4, icon: , title: 'pressure', data: weather.pressure, unit: 'hPa' }, { id:5, icon: , title: 'humidity', data: weather.humidity, unit: '%' }, { id:6, icon: , title: 'min', data: weather.wind.toFixed(), unit: windUnit } ]; return (
min

) } export default Descriptions;
